commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Bas398b941"

diff:
"398b941 Bug 393253 - "Buttons in 'places' panel must have 'id's to theme them." [p=supernova_00@yahoo.com (Kurt [supernova_00]) r=Mano a1.9=mconnor]
diff --git a/browser/components/places/content/moveBookmarks.xul b/browser/components/places/content/moveBookmarks.xul
index 6a9bcbb..47dcd52 100644
--- a/browser/components/places/content/moveBookmarks.xul
+++ b/browser/components/places/content/moveBookmarks.xul
@@ -77,7 +77,8 @@
         <treechildren id="placesListChildren" view="placesList" flex="1"/>
       </tree>
       <vbox>
-        <button label="&newFolderButton.label;"
+        <button id="newFolderButton"
+                label="&newFolderButton.label;"
                 accesskey="&newFolderButton.accesskey;"
                 oncommand="gMoveBookmarksDialog.newFolder();"/>
       </vbox>
"
